# Mercenaries
A mercenary, merc, soldier of fortune, hired gun, dog of war. A professional soldier (though some claim otherwise) whose loyalty can be bought: they will carry out any task as long as the pay is good. Mercenaries are often favored by many corporations for covert operations that need to be deniable.
In this case, the mercenaries were paid by an unidentified non-NanoTrasen corporate entity and are therefore targeted for termination.
